Subject: Web page needs updating

I have been trying unsuccessfully to do a CVS checkout of Heritrix the 
past few weeks based on the instructions here:

http://crawler.archive.org/cvs-usage.html

Today I saw this

http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=73833

and noticed the arguments to cvs were slightly different.  The previous 
page should have all occurrences of

anonymous@...

changed to

anonymous@...

Using the second (correct) argument, I was able to checkout Heritrix 
with no problems.

Thanks,
Frank
